name: gcp_turbinia_ts
short_description: Processes an existing GCP persistent disks with Turbinia project and sends results to Timesketch.
description:
Process GCP persistent disks with Turbinia and send output to Timesketch.

This processes disks that are already in the project where Turbinia exists. If you want to copy disks from another project, use the `gcp_turbinia_disk_copy_ts` recipe.
args: Name of GCP project the disk exists in.
The GCP zone the disk to process (and Turbinia workers) are in.
Name of GCP persistent disk to process.
Run all Turbinia processing jobs instead of a faster subset.
Timesketch sketch to which the timeline should be added.
Optional custom password to decrypt Timesketch credential file with.
Whether to wait for Timesketch to finish processing all timelines.
